content.rendered:
Election frenzy

When it comes to news, no one can beat Asianet News.

Elections are when people turn to news more than usual. In Kerala, Asianet News is the only news channel that has been covering every single election since 1995. Not surprisingly, they are the most sought-after news channel in Kerala with a formidable viewership.
